column4: Anyone: I am brand new to Edgy and Linux for that matter and I love it   I am in here get some help on some things though. Why does my user name change every time I come in here?  It started out as mohlertm then mohlert1 then mohlert2 and now mohlert3.  Does anyone know why that is?
Anyone: Why does my user name change every time I come in here?  It started out as mohlertm then mohlert1 then mohlert2 and now mohlert3.  Does anyone know why that is?
your irc client does that automagically.
if you type /quit it should do it
